name: Mega Match Mall
description:
Are you ready for a unique pair-matching game with a legendary gameplay loved by millions around the world?

Then, this connection-based pair matching puzzle is just for you!

Features:
- A combo match counter for you to multiply your score!
- Various collectible experience points to level up and reserve a seat among the best players!
- Exclusive tile sets for your stores where you can match tile pairs and upgrade your mall
- Tons of tiles with multiple combinations to power up your brain
- Well-designed brain trainer levels which will increase your memory speed
- A mega mall where you can open up new stores, unlock new areas, splendid gardens, a breezy beachside and many more places
- A map where you can explore, visit your stores, check on your customers and collect the money they bring!
- No life restrictions for an unlimited gameplay!
- Offline earnings from your stores that keep making money even when you're not playing!

We offer:
- Strategic planning to level up with the XP you collect and expand your mall
- Level range from easy to hard for all ages to enjoy
- Accessible on-the-go, offers both online and offline playing
- Sync option between devices
- Complete free to play experience with optional in-game purchases
- Auto-save game to continue where you left off
- An easy and fun game to play yet challenging to master gameplay


How to beat the puzzle levels:
- Tap the tile you want to match
- Find its pair and tap to connect the tiles
- Make sure the tiles can be connected with at most 3 steps!
- The further you connect the tiles, the more stars you earn!
- Keep an eye out on the combo counter to multiply your match score!

Have fun playing Mega Match Mall - once you play you'll come back for more!
